messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant.
What can be described in a spell?
strange smells, disorienting visions, curious sounds, and disturbing sensations
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Can a spell be compared to a recipe?
yes, it can be compared to a cooking recipe
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How many differing recipes for bread are there in ten cookbooks?
many differing recipes
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the same for spells and tomes?
many differing names
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What are the resulting breads like?
The resulting breads come in all shapes, sizes, and flavors.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How similar are the specific spells in tomes?
There is a world of difference between all those bread recipes–there is a world of difference between German black bread and focaccia.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the magic point cost for the Create Zombie spell?
The magic point cost is high (16 points)
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the Sanity loss for the Create Zombie spell?
The Sanity loss is 243
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the new casting time for the Grey Binding spell?
1 hour
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the cost of the Grey Binding spell in magic points?
8 magic points
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the alternative name for this version of the spell?
Grey Binding
You are a helpful AI assistant.
